actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: Resolution relating to Agricultural Research in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the prevention of widespread famine and the inflationary pressure of increased domestic food prices requires immediate and substantial public investments in agricultural research and technology for the express purpose of increasing food production which would: (1) insure a ready supply of food at reasonable consumer food costs; (2) aid in the maintenance of a favorable United States trade balance; and (3) reduce the risk of food shortages in years of adverse weather.

titles.title: Resolution relating to Agricultural Research in the United States.
